00013 static const uint8_t    AdafruitBmp180_Address  = 0x77;
00014 static const uint8_t    BMP180_CHIP_ID          = 0x55;

00017 enum Bmp180Registers
00018 {
00019   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC1            = 0xAA,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00020   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC2            = 0xAC,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00021   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC3            = 0xAE,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00022   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC4            = 0xB0,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00023   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC5            = 0xB2,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00024   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC6            = 0xB4,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00025   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_B1             = 0xB6,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00026   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_B2             = 0xB8,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00027   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MB             = 0xBA,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00028   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MC             = 0xBC,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00029   BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MD             = 0xBE,  // R   Calibration data (16 bits)
00030   BMP180_REGISTER_CHIPID             = 0xD0,
00031   BMP180_REGISTER_VERSION            = 0xD1,
00032   BMP180_REGISTER_SOFTRESET          = 0xE0,
00033   BMP180_REGISTER_CONTROL            = 0xF4,
00034   BMP180_REGISTER_TEMPDATA           = 0xF6,
00035   BMP180_REGISTER_PRESSUREDATA       = 0xF6,
00036   BMP180_REGISTER_READTEMPCMD        = 0x2E,
00037   BMP180_REGISTER_READPRESSURECMD    = 0x34
00038 };

00053 
00054 float    Adafruit_BMP180::getAltitude_m( float argSeaLevelPressure_Pa )
00055 {
00056     /* Hyposometric formula:                      */
00057     /*                                            */
00058     /*     ((P0/P)^(1/5.257) - 1) * (T + 273.15)  */
00059     /* h = -------------------------------------  */
00060     /*                   0.0065                   */
00061     /*                                            */
00062     /* where: h   = height (in meters)            */
00063     /*        P0  = sea-level pressure (in hPa)   */
00064     /*        P   = atmospheric pressure (in hPa) */
00065     /*        T   = temperature (in ï¿½C)           */
00066 
00067     return (((float)pow((argSeaLevelPressure_Pa/this->getPressure_Pa()),
00068                         0.190223F) - 1.0F)
00069            * (this->getTemperature_c() + 273.15F))
00070             / 0.0065F;
00071 }
00072

00074 /* ######################################################################### */
00075 
00076 float    Adafruit_BMP180::getPressure_Pa()
00077 {
00078     int32_t  rawTemperature = 0, rawPressure = 0, compp = 0;
00079     int32_t  x1, x2, b5, b6, x3, b3, p;
00080     uint32_t b4, b7;
00081 
00082 
00083     /* Get the raw pressure and temperature values */
00084     rawTemperature  = readRawTemperature();
00085     rawPressure     = readRawPressure();
00086 
00087 
00088     /* Temperature compensation */
00089     x1 = (rawTemperature - (int32_t)(this->m_calibrationData.ac6))*((int32_t)(this->m_calibrationData.ac5))/pow(2,15);
00090     x2 = ((int32_t)(this->m_calibrationData.mc*pow(2,11)))/(x1+(int32_t)(this->m_calibrationData.md));
00091     b5 = x1 + x2;
00092 
00093 
00094     /* Pressure compensation */
00095     b6 = b5 - 4000;
00096     x1 = (this->m_calibrationData.b2 * ((b6 * b6) >> 12)) >> 11;
00097     x2 = (this->m_calibrationData.ac2 * b6) >> 11;
00098     x3 = x1 + x2;
00099     b3 = (((((int32_t) this->m_calibrationData.ac1) * 4 + x3) << this->m_mode ) + 2) >> 2;
00100     x1 = (this->m_calibrationData.ac3 * b6) >> 13;
00101     x2 = (this->m_calibrationData.b1 * ((b6 * b6) >> 12)) >> 16;
00102     x3 = ((x1 + x2) + 2) >> 2;
00103     b4 = (this->m_calibrationData.ac4 * (uint32_t) (x3 + 32768)) >> 15;
00104     b7 = ((uint32_t) (rawPressure - b3) * (50000 >> this->m_mode));
00105 
00106     if (b7 < 0x80000000)
00107     {
00108         p = (b7 << 1) / b4;
00109     }
00110     else
00111     {
00112         p = (b7 / b4) << 1;
00113     }
00114 
00115     x1 = (p >> 8) * (p >> 8);
00116     x1 = (x1 * 3038) >> 16;
00117     x2 = (-7357 * p) >> 16;
00118     compp = p + ((x1 + x2 + 3791) >> 4);
00119 
00120     /* Return compensated pressure value */
00121     return compp;
00122 }

00126 
00127 float    Adafruit_BMP180::getTemperature_c()
00128 {
00129     int32_t UT, X1, X2, B5;
00130     float ret;
00131 
00132     UT  = this->readRawTemperature();
00133 
00134 
00135     X1 = (UT - (int32_t)this->m_calibrationData.ac6)
00136             * ((int32_t)this->m_calibrationData.ac5) / pow(2,15);
00137 
00138     X2 = ((int32_t)this->m_calibrationData.mc * pow(2,11))
00139             / (X1+(int32_t)this->m_calibrationData.md);
00140 
00141     B5 = X1 + X2;
00142 
00143     ret = ( B5 + 8 ) / pow( 2, 4 );
00144     ret /= 10;
00145 
00146     return ret;
00147 }

00152 Adafruit_BMP180::ErrorCode   Adafruit_BMP180::init(Bmp180Mode argMode)
00153 {
00154     /* Init the I2C */
00155     Wire.begin();
00156 
00157 
00158     /* Check the chip ID */
00159     uint8_t id;
00160     this->read_uint8( BMP180_REGISTER_CHIPID, &id );
00161     if( id != BMP180_CHIP_ID ) {
00162         return ErrorBadChipId;
00163     }
00164 
00165 
00166     /* store the selected mode */
00167     this->m_mode    = argMode;
00168 
00169 
00170     /* read the calibration data */
00171     this->readCalibrationData();
00172 
00173 
00174     return NoError;
00175 }

00180 void    Adafruit_BMP180::readCalibrationData()
00181 {
00182     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC1, &m_calibrationData.ac1);
00183     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC2, &m_calibrationData.ac2);
00184     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC3, &m_calibrationData.ac3);
00185     this->read_uint16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC4, &m_calibrationData.ac4);
00186     this->read_uint16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC5, &m_calibrationData.ac5);
00187     this->read_uint16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_AC6, &m_calibrationData.ac6);
00188     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_B1, &m_calibrationData.b1);
00189     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_B2, &m_calibrationData.b2);
00190     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MB, &m_calibrationData.mb);
00191     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MC, &m_calibrationData.mc);
00192     this->read_int16(BMP180_REGISTER_CAL_MD, &m_calibrationData.md);
00193 }

00197 
00198 int32_t     Adafruit_BMP180::readRawPressure()
00199 {
00200     uint8_t  p8;
00201     uint16_t p16;
00202     int32_t  p32;
00203 
00204     this->writeCommand(BMP180_REGISTER_CONTROL,
00205                        BMP180_REGISTER_READPRESSURECMD
00206                        + (this->m_mode << 6) );
00207 
00208     switch( this->m_mode )
00209     {
00210         case ModeUltraLowPower:
00211             delay(5);
00212             break;
00213 
00214         case ModeStandard:
00215             delay(8);
00216             break;
00217 
00218         case ModeHighResolution:
00219             delay(14);
00220             break;
00221 
00222         case ModeUltraHighResolution:
00223         default:
00224             delay(26);
00225             break;
00226     }
00227 
00228     this->read_uint16( BMP180_REGISTER_PRESSUREDATA, &p16 );
00229 
00230     p32 = (uint32_t)p16 << 8;
00231     this->read_uint8( BMP180_REGISTER_PRESSUREDATA+2, &p8);
00232     p32 += p8;
00233     p32 >>= (8 - this->m_mode);
00234 
00235     return p32;
00236 }

00241 int32_t     Adafruit_BMP180::readRawTemperature()
00242 {
00243     int32_t ret = 0;
00244 
00245     this->writeCommand( BMP180_REGISTER_CONTROL, BMP180_REGISTER_READTEMPCMD );
00246 
00247     delay(5);
00248 
00249     uint16_t    val;
00250     this->read_uint16( BMP180_REGISTER_TEMPDATA, &val );
00251     ret = val;
00252 
00253     return ret;
00254 }

00262 
00263     Adafruit_BMP180::read_uint16( argRegister, &i );
00264 
00265     *argValue = (int16_t)i;

00271 void    Adafruit_BMP180::read_uint8(byte argRegister, uint8_t *argValue)
00272 {
00273     Wire.beginTransmission( AdafruitBmp180_Address );
00274 //#if ARDUINO >= 100
00275     Wire.write( (uint8_t)argRegister );
00276 //#else
00277 //    Wire.send(argRegister);
00278 //#endif
00279     Wire.endTransmission();
00280 
00281     Wire.requestFrom( (uint8_t)AdafruitBmp180_Address, (byte)1 );
00282 //#if ARDUINO >= 100
00283     *argValue = Wire.read();
00284 //#else
00285 //    *argValue = Wire.receive();
00286 //#endif
00287     Wire.endTransmission();
00288 }

00293 void    Adafruit_BMP180::read_uint16(byte argRegister, uint16_t *argValue)
00294 {
00295     Wire.beginTransmission((uint8_t)AdafruitBmp180_Address);
00296 //#if ARDUINO >= 100
00297     Wire.write((uint8_t)argRegister);
00298 //#else
00299 //    Wire.send(reg);
00300 //#endif
00301     Wire.endTransmission();
00302 
00303     Wire.requestFrom( (uint8_t)AdafruitBmp180_Address, (byte)2 );
00304 //#if ARDUINO >= 100
00305     *argValue = (Wire.read() << 8) | Wire.read();
00306 //#else
00307 //    *value = (Wire.receive() << 8) | Wire.receive();
00308 //#endif
00309     Wire.endTransmission();
00310 }

00315 void    Adafruit_BMP180::writeCommand(byte argRegister, byte argValue)
00316 {
00317     Wire.beginTransmission((uint8_t)AdafruitBmp180_Address);
00318 
00319     Wire.write((uint8_t)argRegister);
00320     Wire.write((uint8_t)argValue);
00321 
00322     Wire.endTransmission();
00323 }
